AlleneMeeting: You get ready to go out...
But you decide to stay inside tonight instead.
It's snowing outside and very quiet.
You walk to the window peering out from your living room and onto the street you live on.
Through the snow, and past the icicles hanging from your window sill, you peer into the darkness.
There is a woman standing in the street.
You look at each other for a minute.
Maybe you know her from somewhere?
You cautiously step out your front door...
She steps up to meet you.
I guess you can't be expected to see someone casually walking outdoors in this kind of weather late at night and not be a little startled.
Not at all like someone who has been out in the cold for an extended period of time.
Sorry, I haven't introduced myself yet.
Allene seems a little suspicious to you.
...or question why she is out here?
I haven't looked you up or been following you or anything.
I just... hmm. I intrinsically know, you know?
I know that my presence is a strange one...
Hmm... its hard to really answer.
You know how... sometimes you just wind up right where you're supposed to be?
But you don't detect any malicious intent from her.
I shouldn't be making you stand out here in the cold talking to me.
Sometimes I forget your kind can't handle the cold.
I wouldn't want you to die before your time.
She does come off as a little intimidating...
We'll talk more at some place and some time more suitable.
Just ring and I'll be there.
Allene shakes your hand and walks off into the night.
AllenephoneCallpickUp1: Hello there! It's good to hear from you!
You want to do something together? That's very sweet of you.
Did you have anything specific in mind?
AllenephoneCallpickUp2: Good day! I hope you're doing well.
Forgive me. What are you doing today?
Would you like to do something with me?
AllenephoneCallpickUp3: I appreciate you always wanting to talk to me.
I was just feeling kind of lonely, truthfully.
What would you like to do?
AllenephoneCallpickUpBurgers: Hamburgers? Haha... yes, it's important to enjoy more simple pleasures, isn't it?
I would be delighted to get Hamburgers with you.
AllenephoneCallpickUpBar: A bar? Aren't those usually loud?
Ah, what am I saying, that sounds fantastic.
AllenephoneCallpickUpPark: Ah, the quiet of the park.
I would be thrilled to see you there.
AllenephoneCallpickUpVenue: The most obvious cure for loneliness would be to be around other people, would it not?
AllenephoneCallpickUpWrestling: Oh! The marriage of theater and battle?
I would be happy to accompany you to the exhibition.
AllenephoneCallpickUpRestaurant: Oh! A quiet dinner with you?
I would be honored to go with you.
AllenephoneCallpickUpHome: I'm honored you would want to meet me where I already am.
I'll be sure to make it suitable before you arrive.
AllenephoneCallpickUpMall: I'd like to see what kinds of trinkets and such are on sale over there right now.
AlleneBurgers1: Allene is already waiting for you.
I have a questions for you.
Some people are afraid of them.
But other people think they are friendly and entertaining.
What do you think of clowns?
My understanding is that many humans harbor a fear of things in masks or creatures that look eerily similar to them...
So, their modern purpose is not lost on you?
My understanding is that in ages past, some clowns performed both social and religious purposes.
I wonder how they came to be the lovable jesters they are today.
What qualities about clowns do people find so... arousing?
I suppose seeing being able to see the beauty in everything is a gift all its own.
You and Allene discuss the fine art of clowning.

I gotta say, I'm feeling incredibly energetic thanks to these burgers...
I might have to get a few more.

AlleneGiftNeutral: Thank you. I very much appreciate the gesture.
AlleneGiftGood: Thank you! Your thoughtfulness brings a delight to my heart.
AlleneGiftSpecial: I don't know what to say. It reminds me so much of my home... and my history.
